# install Keycloak 
```bash
docker run -d --name keycloak -p 8080:8080 \
  -e KEYCLOAK_ADMIN=admin \
  -e KEYCLOAK_ADMIN_PASSWORD="admin" \
  quay.io/keycloak/keycloak:latest start-dev

Invoke-RestMethod -Uri "http://localhost:8080/realms/petrol/protocol/openid-connect/token" `
  -Method Post `
  -Headers @{"Content-Type"="application/x-www-form-urlencoded"} `
  -Body "client_id=petrol-client&username=nmhung&password=123123"

curl -H "Authorization: Bearer eyJhbGciOiJSUzI1NiIsInR5cCIgOiAiSldUIiwia2lkIiA6ICJST081NFVIMkozRnYtUl9KSnUwVTNWY1NOeWFsdWc2OG5BSVRidWdCZjI0In0..iL6xUKU282M1XsSnZ8SE2WDf_4n9Un2aPZ74VmrDvz-TVE_GXRIBmUpEKH0EJW4psZVkIozr77X_jqmdO0Hb-4E7-e7CJqLNFT4Q1UB8PHmysqhbxNVDT7QUPWeLSv-iCjMtHTRinkwrLmthXlXuJOkjKKkiVOcecAlkymRq8aU4D_UGitAkO1S3IK9wrd_Tzj1cIqPKnH3orhXr-z9EjFvPJU-Cm0esIwbLEUWx7U7oChyCZann1v5R5qjRBc-svr1K-exPKwITq8adqTFSdtKkyK1cn8VIH9eElFmaRE5S4T5tgcwRZaBN4ZD2am_60ApPv0qhz2k68721VBXvyw" http://localhost:6789/secure-data

```
